decoworld.model.world.quests

Interface Quest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicQuest

    public interface Quest
    The Quest object represents a single quest

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • updateEvent

        void updateEvent(QuestEvent e)
        Change the completion state of an event to TRUE indicating that an event has occurred. Note: this is in regards to the Map object
        Parameters:
        o - an event that exists as part of this quest

      • completionStatus

        java.util.Map<QuestEvent,java.lang.Boolean> completionStatus()
        returns the Map object that indicates whether or not an event has occurred,
        Returns:
        Map m

      • prereqs

        java.util.Map<QuestEvent,java.util.List<QuestEvent>> prereqs()
        Returns the Map object that stores an event's prerequisites. i.e. when all of an event's prerequisites are TRUE: the event can then be listened for by some other function. Note that not all events require prerequisites but in the case that they do the option is available.
        Returns:
        map of prerequisites to events

      • requirementsMet

        boolean requirementsMet(QuestEvent e)
        Checks to see if all the prerequisites for a given event are TRUE.
        Parameters:
        o - some event that exists as part of this object
        Returns:
        TRUE iff all prerequisites are TRUE

      • isComplete

        boolean isComplete()
        Checks through mapping of events to bools and returns whether or not they are all completed
        Returns:
        TRUE iff all events are mapped to TRUE

      • setNextQuest

        void setNextQuest(Quest q)
        Set the next quest to occur after this one is complete (this.isComplete() == true)
        Parameters:
        q - the next quest in the series

      • nextQuest

        Quest nextQuest()
        If this quest is part of a series of quests this will return the next in the series, and null if none exists
        Returns:
        Quest q
